content: crochet easter egg pattern skill level beginner measures 3 inches tall materials stitches and abbreviations notes ● worsted weight yarn in any ● r - round ● this pattern is worked in pastel color ● chain - chain continuous rounds do not join ● 3 25mm crochet hook size d ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● a stitch marker is recommended or hook of your choice ● st - stitch keep track of rounds ● polyfil stuffing ● sts - stitches ● a magic_ring is recommended ● yarn needle ● increase - increase to create a tighter starting hole ● stitch marker optional ● decrease - decrease ● your easter eggs will look different depending on your materials and your unique crochet style easter egg with blue or any pastel color r1 chain 2 and single_crochet 6 in second chain from hook 6 ​ r2 increase in each st 12 ​ r3 single_crochet in each st 12 ​ r4 *increase single_crochet in next st* repeat 6x 18 ​ r5 single_crochet in each st 18 ​ r6 *increase single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat 6x 24 ​ r7 - r12 6 rounds single_crochet in each st 24 ​ r13 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat 6x 18 ​ r14 single_crochet in each st 18 ​ pause here to start stuffing your egg continue stuffing as you close it up r15 *decrease single_crochet in next st* repeat 6x 12 ​ r16 *decrease* repeat 6x 6 ​ leave a 6 inch tail and cut yarn with yarn needle close up hole by weaving yarn through the front loops of each single_crochet in round 16 pull tight to close and weave yarn through the egg and cut off extra make eggs in all different colors and use variegated yarns for even more variety i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact me at any time this pattern is the property of babycakesstudios so please do not claim this pattern as your own you are welcome to sell finished products made from this pattern but do not sell this pattern as your own thank you for more patterns visit babycakesstudios com
